title: The Siphon Coffee Brewer | KitchenAid
description:
Introducing our latest craft coffee innovation: the KitchenAid® Siphon Coffee Brewer. This home brewer uses a full immersion technique that was once exclusive to premier coffee houses. We’ve retained the theatrical beauty and precision of the process and simplified it for home use. The result is a complex, velvety and flavorful cup of coffee. 
Learn more at http://www.kitchenaid.com/countertop-appliances/coffee-products/
